summary: Trust is a choice. As a facilitator you can model that choice for your team. Choose to trust them and you'll be amazed at what happens.
details: One primary characteristic of highly functioning teams is pervasive trust. Likewise one characteristic of dysfunctional teams is lack of trust.
credits:
Give people a little more trust and responsibility than they have earned. You'll be amazed. - Advice given to Jack Bolles (by...)
